Articles.Content:
Mission profile #1

LV: Aerobee 1

Mission type: Sounding rocket (Altitude)

Mission debriefing: First of the Aerobee family, tiny tim as the first stage and aerobee 1 second stage. Reached a peak altitude of about 90km. Exploded on landing. Succesfuly performed it’s task to launch.

1/2/2020 (real time)

 

Mission profile #2

LV: Aerobee 1

Mission type: Sounding rocket (altitude)

Mission goal: Pass the karman line

Mission debriefing: Launch vehicle succesfuly launched and started the second stage. Engine continued burning until fuel depletion. Peak altitude around 130km. Exploded on landing.

1/2/2020 (real time)

 

Mission profile #3

LV: Aerobee 1R

Mission type: Sounding rocket (Altitude)

Mission goal: Pass karman line and return a capsule

Mission debriefing: Succesfuly launched and started the second stage. Peak altitude around 130km. Capsule landed on a parachute.

1/2/2020 (real time)

Edited February 1, 2020 by KnedlikMCPE
Corrections

Mission profile #4-8

LV: SDV 1 (Suborbital Development Vehicle 1)

Mission type: Sounding rocket (altitude)

Mission goal: Pass 140km in altitude and return

Mission debriefing: Vehicle succesfuly launched. Second stage didn’t fire. Capsule landed on a parachute.

1/2/2020 (real time)

 

Mission profile #9

LV: SDV 1

Mission type: Sounding rocket (altitude)

Mission goal: Pass 140km and return

Mission debriefing: Succesfuly launched and fired second stage. Capsule seperated shortly after second stage burnout. Peak altitude aroung 180km. Landed on a parachute and sunk. Mission was a success.

30/9/1955

Edited February 1, 2020 by KnedlikMCPE

Mission report #10

LV: SDV 2

Mission type: Sounding rocket (altitude)

Mission goal: Test landing site and deliver a payload

Mission debriefing: Succesfuly launched. One of three engines fired on the second stage. Exploded on landing.

24/1/1956
